versions.description:
Patch release with frontend improvements, bug fixes, and versioning updates.

üõ†Ô∏è Improvements:
- Window resizing updated to 85% screen width without auto-centering to prevent jumping between monitors.
- Dark mode logic improved using useTheme hook for consistent body class behavior.
- Version numbers updated across configuration files (package.json, lib.rs, tauri configs) to follow semantic versioning with patch identifiers.
- New Makefile target `sync_frontend` added to streamline frontend sync for Langflow integration.

üêõ Bug Fixes:
- Prevented click event propagation in custom-langflow-counts.tsx to avoid unintended behavior.
- Fixed `disabled` logic in custom-parameter.tsx to respect edge and tool mode conditions.
- Corrected progress calculation in get-started-progress.tsx to display accurate completion percentages.
Main release version with tauri updater
